prompt: Classify the following text as positive, negative, or neutral: I'm absolutely thrilled with my new job! The work environment is fantastic, my colleagues are incredibly supportive, and I'm learning so much every day. The projects I'm involved in are challenging in the best way possible, pushing me to grow and develop new skills. My boss is great too - always encouraging and providing constructive feedback. The company culture promotes a healthy work-life balance, which I really appreciate. I wake up every morning excited to start my workday, and I feel like I'm making a real difference. This career move has truly been a game-changer for me, boosting both my professional satisfaction and personal happiness. I couldn't be more grateful for this amazing opportunity!
